GSD.description:
md-raid10: fix KASAN warning

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.326 by commit 75fbd370a2cec9e92f48285bd90735ed0c837f52. For more details please see the references link.
